content:
@Zeeshan Equbal just added an updating and configurable per-stream visual notifications setting in zulip-terminal :tada:
It was already agreed that zulip-terminal would use the server "desktop" notifications setting (for now at least), and are currently iterating on the wording.
Current main has Visual desktop notification, but with #T1080 we're planning to move towards Visual notifications (Terminal/Web/Desktop), to ensure that users recognize settings will affect the other platforms.
Is that consistent/reasonable from the web/desktop perspective?
(I just merged #T1080 since it supports other features, but we can still adjust of course :+1:)

I think that's probably reasonable for a first pass. It's possible we will want to split out a separate setting long-term, because you might want to only get notifications from your terminal app, not the browser.
